actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation with amendment, H. Rept. 96-179.
Measure called up by special rule in House.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 1142 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House) Amends the John F. Kennedy Center Act to authorize appropriations for the John F. Kennedy Center through fiscal year 1980. Designates Ralph E. Becker as an honorary trustee of the Kennedy Center. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to place plaques in the Kennedy Center honoring Mr. Becker and Roger L. Stevens.

titles.title: A bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.
